TextView.android:text: Colockum Hillside Farm’s original purpose was to support the health and wellness of our own family. But, as the farm grows and thrives we are able to offer the same thoughtfully produced food that we grow for ourselves to our local Ellensburg community. We are excited to watch our customer list grow and to receive positive feedback from customers who value what we do. We love growing healthy and whole food for our family, friends, and neighbors.

Mother Theresa once said, “We can do no great things—only small things with great love.” Colockum Hillside Farm is a small farm built on daily acts of love. Little things like getting up before dawn to thaw out frozen chicken watering buckets, nursing injured chickens back to health in a box on our closet floor, feeding the compost pile daily so that it in turn can feed our garden soil, hand weeding garden beds so that vegetable plants can thrive, moving animal housing frequently to give them access to fresh and clean forage and avoid damaging the land by overgrazing. All of these are the small, routine acts that build our farm.
